issue.title: [C++][CI] Appveyor CI test failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9085](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9085). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://ci.appveyor.com/project/ApacheSoftwareFoundation/arrow/builds/33417919

These seem to have been introduced by 

https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/b058cf0d1c26ad7984c104bb84322cc7dcc66f00

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9085?focusedCommentId=17129888) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'm going to revert the Compression changes that caused this

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9085?focusedCommentId=17130437) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7390
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7390>
